price: 63. Addoomaha Raxmaanka (Alle) waa kuwa ku mara dhulka miyir26, markayna maangaabyada kula hadlaan (ereyo xun) ku qaabila hadal ka maran gef ama xumaan 27.
arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا
footnotes:
26. Xasillooni si sharaf leh aan iskibrin lahayn. 
27. Salaamaa macnaha waa hadal nabad ah ka maran gef ama xumaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waʿibādu al-raḥmāni alladhīna yamshūna ʿalā al-arḍi hawnan wa-idhā khāṭabahumu al-jāhilūna qālū salāman
